H0.text: What communal cooking method/equipment derives from French 'melted'. Baine-Marie

H1.text: What communal cooking method/equipment derives from French 'melted'. Bouillabaisse

H2.text: What communal cooking method/equipment derives from French 'melted'. Casserole

H3.text: What communal cooking method/equipment derives from French 'melted'. Fondu

A4.text: The word fondue is the feminine passive past participle, used as a noun, of the French verb fondre 'to melt', and thus means 'melted'.
